content: create a vibrant rainbow lanyard with this easy crochet pattern perfect for beginners this pattern is worked flat using slip_stitch crochet and features colorful stripes the pattern includes written instructions and a video tutorial for extra guidance make these in your school colors or favorite sports team colors to show team pride for fundraisers and for craft fairs **unique features-** easy one-piece crochet pattern worked sideways for a unique construction includes written instructions and video tutorial for support features colorful stripes for a fun and stylish finish **materials needed-** us-g 4 00mm hook 5-10 yds each of 6 different colors worsted weight yarn recommended **lily sugar n cream** https //amzn to/43xtnj3 1 split key ring http //amzn to/q4tzom or size desired optional safety breakaway buckle http //amzn to/1mjowuk lanyard clips http //amzn to/1atjf8c
